amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds in the bill from being paid to any managed care network under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Plan that offers physicians financial incentives to withhold medically necessary information from their patients.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit managed health care plans under the Federal Employee's Health Benefits Plan from offering doctors financial incentives to not provide medically necessary care.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
